title: MSX Inspirations
content:
I've been watching more and more MSX video(s?) and video(s?) on what Konami did with them, one trick I liked was to add content / secrets to the game if you added another game into the MSX.

That just hits right and now I wanna do it.
Would it not be cool nowadays to put a game executable into a game on your PC and the game will change cause you did that?

Now that I think about it I'm pretty sure that would work with mods too, the mod looks to see if you have another enabled and maybe it adds some stuff, new skins, new easter eggs, etc etc, LOL maybe a new level using that mod's assets, that makes more sense.
